item.title: Math Sample
item.description:
\[a \ne 0\]

Inline shortcode \(a \ne 0\) with Mathjax.

KaTeX can be used to generate complex math formulas server-side.

$$ \phi = \frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2} = 1.6180339887\cdots $$

Additional details can be found on GitHub or on the Wiki.

item.title: Research Articles
item.description: Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1984). (in Spanish). Quaternionic extensions. In: Proceedings of the IV Coloquio Latinoamericano De Algebra, Mendoza, Argentina. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1986). Quaternionic extensions and rotations. Notas De La Sociedad Matemática De Chile, 5(1), 201–202. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1987). (Unpublished). Relations between quadratic forms and certain Galois extensions. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1990). (Ph.D. Thesis–The Ohio State University). On the Square Root of Special Values of Certain L-Series. ProQuest LLC, Ann Arbor, MI.
